articles.description: The Lucknow Super Giants on August 17 (Thursday) announced that MSK Prasad will serve as the strategic advisor of the franchise from IPL 2024. Therefore, he joins the coaching staff of the franchise that Gautam Gambhir is the part of.
articles.content: Gautam Gambhir Linked With KKR After EX-India Selector, Criticised By Him In 2019 World Cup Joins LSG: Report
